description: Ucai hooks - session context injection and iteration control

hooks.command: bash -c 'p="$0"; command -v cygpath >/dev/null && p="$(cygpath -u "$p")"; exec bash "$p"' '${CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT}/hooks/handlers/session-start.sh'
bash -c 'p="$0"; command -v cygpath >/dev/null && p="$(cygpath -u "$p")"; exec bash "$p"' '${CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT}/hooks/handlers/stop-handler.sh'
